text: Yusuphale bhaneh ki juna khana timila'i prapta hunevala cha, tyo a'unubhanda agadi nai maile timila'i tyasako artha ra vastavikata bhanidinechu. Yi ti kuraharumadhyeka hun, juna mero palanakartale mala'i sika'unu bha'eko cha. Juna manisaharu allahamathi visvasa gardainan ra paralokako dinala'i nakardachan, maile tiniharuko dharma chodisakeko chu
